ctu_text:
The first two months scholarship will be paid on full rates and the half
scholarship will be paid on full rates and the half scholarship will be paid for the
preceding two months. 
(iii) No scholarship will be given if the absence exceeds four months. The payment of
scholarship for the first four months, however, will be governed by the sub-clause (i)
and (ii) above. 
(iv) In the case of married women, the scholarship will be admissible at full rates upto
three months absence on grounds of maternity.

ctu_text: (Forestry) etc. The value of the scholarship will be \u20b9 300/- per month along with a contingent grant of \u20b9 750/- per annum for the payment of tuition fees, purchase of books, cost of uniforms, etc. The duration of the scholarship will cover the whole of the normal period of the particular degree program to which the candidate is admitted. The scheme provides for the award of 240 scholarships every year.
